{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = D-Link DNS-323.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = 2-Bay Network Attached Storage Enclosure |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = http://www.dlink.ru/ru/products/9/644.html |ppalt = (RU) |sp = https://support.dlink.com/ProductInfo.aspx?m=DNS-323 |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = D-Link_DNS-323 |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = D-Link |model = DNS-323 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = A1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = NAS |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Marvell;88F5181; |cpu1_cores = 1 |cpu1_type = ARM926EJ |cpu1_type_rev = <!-- CPU1 type Revision, Leave blank for unknown --> |cpu1spd = 500 <!-- 500 MHz ? --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),NAND,Compact Flash --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Spansion;S29GL064M90TFIR40; |flash1size = 8 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4 --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 64 |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5DS16M16CS-6K; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Marvell;88E1111; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 00:26:5A
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;2.6;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0 |exp_usb_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12.5 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = yes |jtag = yes
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = fan |addchip = IDE Controller; Marvell; 88X7042;;1; |802dot11_protocols = none
|defaulip = 192.168.0.32 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 08/2006 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B002O0K9I2 |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===[http://dns323.kood.org/start Specifications]=== {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="3px" style="border: 1px solid black; border-spacing: 0px; width: 50%; text-align:center;" ! CPU | [[Marvell]] [http://www.marvell.com/press/pressNewsDisplay.do?releaseID=544 88F5181] @500 MHz (Feroceon ARM) |- ! RAM | Nanya NT5DS16M16CS-6K (2x 32MB) |- ! Flash | Spansion S29GL064M90TFIR4 (8MB) |- ! LAN | [[Marvell]] 88E1111 |- ! IDE Controller | [[Marvell]] 88X7042 |- ! USB | 1x USB 2.0 |- ! Serial | 115200 8N1 TTL |- ! Firmware | 1.01 / 1.02 / 1.03 / 1.04 / 1.05 / 1.06 |- ! Bootloader | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/u-boot-1_1_1_5181.tgz U-Boot 1.1.1] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/u-boot_1_7_3.tgz U-Boot 1.7.3] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/u-boot_1_7_3_5182.tgz U-Boot 1.7.3-5182] |- ! Kernel | [ftp://ftp.dlink.se/Products/dns-products/dns-323/drivers_firmware/DNS-323GPL.rar Linux-2.6.6] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/linux-2.6.12.6.tgz Linux-2.6.12.6] |- ! C library | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/uclibc-toolchain-src-20040609.tgz uClibc 0.9.28] |- ! Busybox | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/busybox-1.00-pre1.tgz v1.00-pre1] |- ! Samba | [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/samba-src.tgz 2.2.8a] / [ftp://ftp.dlink.com/GPL/DNS-323/samba-3.0.24.tgz 3.0.24] |- ! Benchmarks | DNS-323 benchmarks |- ! Cooling | 40mm fan (speed controlled) |- |}
==Links of Interest== [http://www.dlink.ru/u/faq/98/1015.html NAS Comparison]
===About D-Link DNS-323=== *[http://dns323.kood.org/forum/viewforum.php?id=3 ''D-Link DNS-323'' Forum] *[http://dns323.kood.org/start ''D-Link DNS-323'' Wiki] :*D-Link DNS-323 rev.A1 • CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5181 @500MHz :*D-Link DNS-323 rev.B1 • CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F5182 @400MHz :*D-Link DNS-323 rev.C1 • CPU: [[Marvell]] Feroceon rev 0 [https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/D-Link/DNS-323 (v5l)]
===Firmware=== *[https://wiki.debian.org/InstallingDebianOn/D-Link/DNS-323 Installing Debian Linux on D-Link DNS-323 NAS] :*[http://www.cyrius.com/debian/orion/d-link/dns-323/ Debian on D-Link DNS-323 and Conceptronic CH3SNAS] *[http://sourceforge.net/projects/alt-f/ Alt-F is a free alternative firmware for the D-Link DNS-320/321/323/325] :*[https://sites.google.com/site/altfirmware/ Alt-F - Alt FW for the D-Link DNS-320/320L/321/323/325/327L]
